snippet: The offensive is the first expansion of the United States’ campaign against the Islamist militant group that President Obama outlined last week in a speech to the nation.
abstract: Pentagon officials say United States has stepped up its airstrike campaign in Iraq, hitting targets near Baghdad in effort to help Iraqi government win back territory seized by Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: The offensive is the first expansion of the United States’ campaign against the Islamist militant group that President Obama outlined last week in a speech to the nation.

headline.main: U.S. Airstrikes Hit Targets Near Baghdad Held by ISIS
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airstrikes Hit Targets Near Baghdad Held by ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
